description.english: Find all patterns in level 1 - You have found all the hidden patterns spread throughout the soft green meadows.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les formes du niveau 1
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los patrones en el nivel 1

description.english: Find all patterns in level 2 - You have found all the hidden patterns hidden in between the steep pink cliffs.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les formes du niveau 2.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los patrones en el nivel 2

description.english: Find all patterns in level 3 - You have found all the hidden patterns scattered across the beach.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les formes du niveau 3.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los patrones en el nivel 3

description.english: Find all patterns in level 4 - You have found all the hidden patterns that were obscured in the jungle.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les formes du niveau 4
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los patrones en el nivel 4

description.english: Find all patterns in level 5 - You have found all the hidden patterns that remained in the desert.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les formes du niveau 5
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los patrones en el nivel 5

description.english: Find all blueprints in level 1 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the soft meadows.
description.french: Trouvez tous les blueprints du niveau 1
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los planos en el nivel 1

description.english: Find all blueprints in level 2 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the cliffs.
description.french: Trouvez tous les blueprints du niveau 2
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los planos en el nivel 2

description.english: Find all blueprints in level 3 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the beach.
description.french: Trouvez tous les blueprints au niveau 3
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los planos en el nivel 3

description.english: Find all blueprints in level 4 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the jungle.
description.french: Trouvez tous les blueprints au niveau 4
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los planos en el nivel 4

description.english: Find all blueprints in level 5 - You have unlocked and reclaimed all the animal shapes to be found in the desert.
description.french: Trouvez tous les blueprints au niveau 5
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los planos en el nivel 5

description.english: Find all memories in level 1 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the meadows.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les mémoires du niveau 1
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos en el nivel 1

description.english: Find all memories in level 2 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the cliffs.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les mémoires du niveau 2
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos en el nivel 2

description.english: Find all memories in level 3 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the beach.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les mémoires du niveau 3
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos en el nivel 3

description.english: Find all memories in level 4 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the jungle.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les mémoires du niveau 4
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos en el nivel 4

description.english: Find all memories in level 5 - You have regained all of the memories that were scattered in the desert.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les mémoires du niveau 5
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos en el nivel 5

displayName.spanish: Explorador de la cueva: Los prados

description.english: Find all caves in level 1 - You have explored all the caves of the meadows, old drawings of a long time ago, when Stuffy’s once lived in peace in these parts.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caves du niveau 1
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas en el nivel 1

displayName.spanish: Explorador de la cueva: Los acantilados

description.english: Find all caves in level 2 - You have explored all the caves of the cliffs, and discovered about the things that are and the things that aren’t.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caves du niveau 2
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas en el nivel 2

displayName.spanish: Explorador de la cueva: La playa

description.english: Find all caves in level 3 - You have explored all the caves of the beach, and discovered about the journey.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caves du niveau 3
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas en el nivel 3

displayName.spanish: Explorador de la cueva: La selva

description.english: Find all caves in level 4 - You have explored all the caves of the jungle, the most recent paintings made and discovered about the times of woe.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caves du niveau 4
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas en el nivel 4

displayName.spanish: Explorador de la cueva: El desierto

description.english: Find all caves in level 5 - You have explored all the caves of the desert, the oldest of all, and discovered about what once was, and then wasn’t.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caves du niveau 5
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas en el nivel 5

description.dutch: Vind in één enkele playthrough alle patronen in het spel!
description.english: In a single playthrough, find all patterns in the game! - On this journey, you have collected all the patterns in the world of Woven, the good, the bad, and the downright unfashionable ones too. You are a true collector.
description.french: En une seule partie, trouvez tous toutes les formes du jeu!
description.german: Finde in einem einzigen Durchgang alle Muster im Spiel!
description.spanish: En una sola jugada, ¡encuentra todos los patrones del juego!

description.dutch: Vind in een enkele playthrough alle blauwdrukken in het spel!
description.english: In a single playthrough, find all blueprints in the game! - On this journey, you have salvaged all the animal blueprints that were scattered over the world, giving Glitch the precious knowledge of how to shape these creatures.You are a saviour of this knowledge.
description.french: En une seule partie, trouvez tous les blueprints du jeu!
description.german: Finde in einem einzigen Durchgang alle Blaupausen im Spiel!
description.spanish: En una sola jugada, ¡encuentra todos los planos del juego!

description.dutch: Vind in een enkele playthrough alle herinneringen in de game!
description.english: In a single playthrough, find all memories in the game! - On this journey, you have retrieved all the memories that were scattered across the land, a long long time ago. Giving a glimpse of a glimpse of the knowledge lost. Thanks to you, Glitch has regained his identity. You now know what must be done.
description.french: En une seule partie, trouvez toutes les mémoires du jeu!
description.german: Finde in einem einzigen Durchgang alle Erinnerungen im Spiel!
description.spanish: En una sola jugada, ¡encuentra todos los recuerdos del juego!

description.dutch: Vind in een enkele playthrough alle grotten in het spel!
description.english: In a single playthrough, find all caves in the game! - On this Journey, you have retraced the steps of the Stuffies and found all their cave drawings. You have lived their journey. Are you ready to undertake that final step?
description.french: En une seule partie, trouvez toutes les caves du jeu!
description.german: Finde in einem einzigen Durchgang alle Höhlen im Spiel!
description.spanish: En una sola jugada, ¡encuentra todas las cuevas del juego!

description.dutch: Na uren hard werken, het dragen van de meest belachelijke outfits, is het officieel. Stuffy is zo modieus dat hij de komende jaren modetrends zal bepalen. Slanglederen laarzen wellicht de eerste?
description.english: Be fashionable. - After hours of hard work, wearing the most ridiculous outfits, it is official. Stuffy is so fashionable that he will set fashion trends for years to come. Snake leather boots being the first?
description.french: Après des heures de dur labeur, portant les tenues les plus ridicules, c'est officiel. Stuffy est tellement à la mode qu'il créera des tendances pour les années à venir. A commencer par  les bottes en cuir de serpent?
description.german: Nach stundenlanger harter Arbeit in den lächerlichsten Outfits ist es offiziell. Stuffy ist so modisch, dass er in den kommenden Jahren Modetrends setzen wird. Schlangenlederstiefel sind die ersten?
description.spanish: Después de horas de duro trabajo, con los trajes más ridículos, es oficial. Stuffy está tan a la moda que marcará las tendencias de la moda en los próximos años. ¿Las botas de cuero de serpiente serán las primeras?
